==**CONFIGURATION DE BASE ROUTEUR ET SWITCH**==

enable
conf t
enable secret cisco
line vty 0 15
password class
login
line console 0
password cisco
no login
banner motd @ CLASSE: L2 GLRS @
hostname SW

==**ADRESSAGE DES ROUTEURS**==

==R1==
interface G0/0
ip add 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface G0/1
ip add 192.168.2.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface s0/0/1
ip add 209.165.200.1 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/0
ip add 209.165.200.5 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/1
ip add 209.165.200.9 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/0
ip add 209.165.200.13 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/1
ip add 209.165.200.17 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/0
ip add 209.165.200.21 255.255.255.252
no shut

==R2==
interface G0/0
ip add 192.168.3.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface G0/1
ip add 192.168.4.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface s0/1/0
ip add 209.165.200.2 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/1
ip add 209.165.200.25 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/1
ip add 209.165.200.29 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/0
ip add 209.165.200.33 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/0
ip add 209.165.200.37 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/1
ip add 209.165.200.41 255.255.255.252
no shut

==R3==
interface G0/0
ip add 192.168.5.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface G0/1
ip add 192.168.6.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface s0/1/1
ip add 209.165.200.6 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/0
ip add 209.165.200.26 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/1
ip add 209.165.200.45 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/0
ip add 209.165.200.49 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/1
ip add 209.165.200.53 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/0
ip add 209.165.200.57 255.255.255.252
no shut

==R4==

no shutdown

ip add 192.168.8.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface s0/1/1
ip add 209.165.200.10 255.255.255.252
no shut

no shut

no shut

no shut
interface s0/2/1
ip add 209.165.200.65 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/0
ip add 209.165.200.69 255.255.255.252
no shut

==R5==

no shut

no shut

no shut

no shut

no shut

no shut
interface s0/0/0
ip add 209.165.200.74 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/1
ip add 209.165.200.81 255.255.255.252
no shut

==R7==
interface G0/0
ip add 192.168.13.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface G0/1
ip add 192.168.14.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
interface s0/0/1
ip add 209.165.200.22 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/1
ip add 209.165.200.42 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/2/0
ip add 209.165.200.58 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/1
ip add 209.165.200.70 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/0/0
ip add 209.165.200.78 255.255.255.252
no shut
interface s0/1/0
ip add 209.165.200.82 255.255.255.252
no shut

==**ADRESSAGE DES SWITCH**==

== SW1==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.1.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.1.1

== SW2==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.2.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.2.1

== SW3==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.3.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.3.1

== SW4==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.4.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.4.1

== SW5==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.5.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.5.1

== SW6==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.6.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.6.1

== SW7==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.7.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.7.1

== SW8==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.8.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.8.1

== SW9==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.9.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.9.1

== SW10==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.10.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.10.1

== SW11==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.11.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.11.1

== SW12==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.12.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.12.1

== SW13==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.13.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.13.1

== SW14==
interface vlan 1
ip address 192.168.14.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown
ip default-gateway 192.168.14.1


==**ROUTAGES STATIQUES**==

==R1==
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.2
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.2
ip route 192.168.5.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.6
ip route 192.168.6.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.6
ip route 192.168.7.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.10
ip route 192.168.8.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.10
ip route 192.168.9.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.14
ip route 192.168.10.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.14
ip route 192.168.11.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.18
ip route 192.168.12.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.18
ip route 192.168.13.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.22
ip route 192.168.14.0 255.255.255.0 209.165.200.22
ip route 209.165.200.24 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.2
ip route 209.165.200.28 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.2
ip route 209.165.200.32 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.2
ip route 209.165.200.36 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.2
ip route 209.165.200.40 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.2
ip route 209.165.200.44 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.6
ip route 209.165.200.48 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.6
ip route 209.165.200.52 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.6
ip route 209.165.200.56 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.6
ip route 209.165.200.60 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.10
ip route 209.165.200.64 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.10
ip route 209.165.200.68 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.10
ip route 209.165.200.72 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.14
ip route 209.165.200.76 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.14
ip route 209.165.200.80 255.255.255.252 209.165.200.18


==R2==
